Room.Name: Lake View Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the western stretch of Lake View Road, north of the city.
Room.LongDescription: You are at the top of a wide valley, protected from the elements by high mountain ranges. The city of Kista is to the south and Lake Kista is to the east of you. You have heard that the lake has purifying powers, but not everyone believes it. The runoff from the lake provides the drinking water to the city below, and the entire city enjoys good health, if that is any indication of the water's ability.
